title: Some women of Marrakech

description: Episode of Series "Disappearing world". An all-woman camera team gives a feminist perspective on the realities of Islamic women's lives in Marrakech. Shows the taboos and their rights and obligations under Islamic Law from a western point of view. Includes many interviews and documents a real Islamic wedding and the traditions that are followed. Commentary by Gill Shepherd.
